title: Sundaram Home Finance lines up aggressive expansion plans
description: Sundaram Home Finance, a subsidiary of non-banking finance company Sundaram Finance Ltd., plans to expand by adding 40 branches across India. The company reported an 18% rise in net profit for Q3 2023, reaching Rs 62.28 crore. It plans to add more branches in home finance, small business loans, and affordable housing segments.
